messages.content: Hello write the first chapter "Genesis" where it is explained just how long the man has worked on this, and how stressed he is. He should be around 40 so don't make him young. The guy has seen a lot and experienced a lot and the whole world is counting on him.

main_characters:
Dr. Jamie Bloom
Assistant Oliver Brown
plot_ideas: Dr. Bloom has spent 3 years working on a system so complex and requiring so much energy to run that it can only be ran once. The finalization approaches, and if he succeeds, he will save Earth from an incoming asteroid 10x larger than the one that wiped out the dinosaurs.
